### **November 10th - 13th, 2020 **

4-day workshop covering methods used to analyze single cell RNA-seq data using R/RStudio.

### **Prerequisites**

A basic understanding of the R programming language. Individuals without R experience will need to complete remedial online courses suggested by instructors. 

### **Schedule**

* **Session 0** | November 9<sup>th</sup>, 1:00pm - 3:00pm
  + Course on-boarding session for those with questions on prerequisite material 
  
* **Session 1** | November 10<sup>th</sup>, 1:00pm - 3:00pm
  + Introduction and data pre-processing
  + Quality control
      
* **Session 2** | November 11<sup>th</sup>, 1:00pm - 3:00pm
  + Clustering
  + Cell-type annotation

* **Session 3** | November 12<sup>th</sup>, 1:00pm - 3:00pm
  + Pseudotime
  + Dataset alignment

* **Session 4** | November 13<sup>th</sup>, 1:00pm - 3:00pm
  + Multi-modal data
  + VDJ
